Athletic Director's Honor Roll, Spring 2022, Fall 2022, Spring 2023

ATHLETIC HONORS

2024 Athlon Sports Pre-Season All-Sun Belt Fourth-Team Offense

AT GEORGIA STATE: Three-year letterwinner who enjoyed a breakout season at tight end in 2023 .... Strong blocker and receiver and a versatile player who was a high school quarterback ... Career totals of 32 receptions fo 254 yards and four touchdowns.

2023: Starting tight end with 19 catches for 147 yards and four touchdowns ... Caught touchdown passes of 24 and three yards in win at Louisiana ... Also had two scores at Old Dominion on receptions of 29 and 11 yards.

2022: Played in all 12 games in 2022, starting the final eight ... Caught 13 passes for 107 yards ... Career highs of four catch for 20 yards vs. Coastal Carolina ... Caught three passes for a career-best 29 yards in win at Southern Miss .. Had two catches for 24 yards, including a season-long 22-yard completion, at App State.

Redshirted in 2021, when he saw action in three games ... Earned playing time as a true freshman and played in six games in 2020 ... Versatile athlete who played quarterback in high school ... Member of the 2019-20 signing class.

HIGH SCHOOL: Honorable mention selection to the South Carolina Football Coaches Association All-State team for Class 4A ... Helped Westwood High School reach the Upper State quarterfinals ... Selected to play in the North-South All-Star Game.
